column4: I've forgotten my user name and password to load ubuntu do I have to reinstall?
append 1 to boot option for single user mode and passwd user
if you forgot grub password you need to use a root kit and just chroot in and set password
I'm a noob How do I append 1?
hit esc when the count down starts, press e, to edit entry, press e for the line with the kernel on it, add " 1" to the end (no quoted), press enter, press b
then when you see a command prompt, just type "passwd YOURUSERNAME" (No quotes)
ok thanks I'll give that a try.  Will I be able to create a new user and password after that?
I don't remember my user name either.
oh... then to find your username, type cat /etc/passwd and look at the last line, that is your username
I have no pw in grub is for the os.
good, then you will be able to append the 1 and get to single user
